info.title: Database Management Solutions for Db2 for z/OS
info.description: Db2 for z/OS management data services for administration, performance monitoring, schema provisioning, and other Db2 generic purposes.

tags.name: IDB2
tags.description: SYSVIEW for Db2 statistics and management

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: DBM Data Service user authentication services

get.summary: Lists requests for a given token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Specifies a base64url-coded token that identifies the request

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet agent ID. Required unless the 'ssid' parameter is specified. Takes precedence over ‘ssid’ if both are specified. Use /gen/agents to list active agents, look for an agent with 'IDB2' value in the Prefix field.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘agent’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'agent' parameter is specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

503.description: Unable to start the request (Db2 down)

get.summary: Returns the result of a given DS* request

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Specifies the DS* request name.

parameters.name: delta
parameters.description: Returns delta values if available.

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet agent ID. Required unless the 'ssid' parameter is specified. Takes precedence over ‘ssid’ if both are specified. Use /gen/agents to list active agents, look for an agent with 'IDB2' value in the Prefix field.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘agent’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'agent' parameter is specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

put.summary: Returns the result of a given DS* request with provided Xnet parameters (serviceability endpoint)

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Specifies the DS* request name.

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet agent ID. Required unless the 'ssid' parameter is specified. Takes precedence over ‘ssid’ if both are specified. Use /gen/agents to list active agents, look for an agent with 'IDB2' value in the Prefix field.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘agent’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'agent' parameter is specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

put.summary: Reloads the Xnet Environments configuration file and rebuilds the cached routing table and Db2 subsystem lists. The request can be used to add or modify Environments without restarting the DBM Data Service

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

200.description: Successfully reloaded the Environments configuration file

put.summary: Refreshes the cached Xnet routing and Db2 subsystem information. The request can be used to enable access to recently started Xnet Agents and Db2 subsystems

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

200.description: Successfully refreshed Xnet routing and Db2 subsystem information

put.summary: Reloads the templateSettings configuration file and clears the template cache. Use this request to complete the following tasks without restarting the DBM Data Service: add or modify modifications in the templateSettings configuration file or modify template text.

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

200.description: Successfully reloaded the templateSettings configuration file and cleared the template cache.

get.summary: Retrieves SQL statements for a given SQLCODE

parameters.name: sqlcode
parameters.description: Specifies the SQLCODE

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘group’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 data sharing group attach name. If specified, response returns data sharing group data. Requires 'ssid' or 'environment' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active groups.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves the SQL statement text in a given SQL Error Package

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: Specifies the package name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies the package type

parameters.name: collid
parameters.description: Specifies the package collection ID

parameters.name: contoken
parameters.description: Specifies the package consistency token

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specifies the package version

parameters.name: sect
parameters.description: Specifies the statement section number

parameters.name: stmt
parameters.description: Specifies the statement number

parameters.name: sstk
parameters.description: Specifies the timestamp of the error event (SQL_ERROR_TIME) that is returned by the SQLCODE Statements endpoint (/v1/pdt/sqlcodes/{sqlcode}/list).

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘group’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 data sharing group attach name. If specified, response returns data sharing group data. Requires 'ssid' or 'environment' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active groups.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves Dynamic SQL statements for a given Plan Package

parameters.name: planname
parameters.description: Specifies the plan name

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: Specifies the package name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies the package type

parameters.name: collid
parameters.description: Specifies the package collection ID

parameters.name: contoken
parameters.description: Specifies the package consistency token

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specifies the package version

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires the 'ssid' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves Packages for a given Plan

parameters.name: planname
parameters.description: Specifies the plan name

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘group’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 data sharing group attach name. If specified, response returns data sharing group data. Requires 'ssid' or 'environment' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active groups.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves Keys for a given Plan

parameters.name: planname
parameters.description: Specifies the plan name

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires ‘ssid’ or ‘group’ parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 data sharing group attach name. If specified, response returns data sharing group data. Requires 'ssid' or 'environment' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active groups.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Specifies the filter type (Detector key), e.g. U (auth ID), R (correlation ID), C (connection type), N (connection name), D (location), I (end user ID), X (transaction), W (workstation)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves the Dynamic SQL statement text for a given Plan

parameters.name: planname
parameters.description: Specifies the plan name

parameters.name: sect
parameters.description: Specifies the statement section number

parameters.name: stmt
parameters.description: Specifies the statement number

parameters.name: sqlt
parameters.description: Specifies the Detector statement token

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires the 'ssid' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.

get.summary: Retrieves Dynamic SQL statements for a given Plan

parameters.name: planname
parameters.description: Specifies the plan name

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Specifies the Xnet environment. Requires the 'ssid' parameter to be specified. Use /gen/environments to list configured environments.

parameters.name: ssid
parameters.description: Specifies the Db2 subsystem ID. Required unless the 'group' and 'environment' parameters are specified. Use /gen/subsystems/active to list active SSIDs.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Specifies the filter type (Detector key), e.g. U (auth ID), R (correlation ID), C (connection type), N (connection name), D (location), I (end user ID), X (transaction), W (workstation)

parameters.name: keyf
parameters.description: Specifies the filter value. Required if 'key' parameter is specified, e.g. USER1 for key 'U'.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specifies the interval start time when historical data is requested. Required if 'end' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Specifies the interval end time when historical data is requested. Required if 'start' is specified. Format: {YYYY-mm-DD-hh.MM.ss}

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows to return. A value of zero will return all rows

parameters.name: flattenResults
parameters.description: Flattens the response structure into key-value pairs. Suitable for requests with a small number of response rows.
